SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2016)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MOTOR VEHICLE EXPENSES AND BENEFITS 2016) in order to implement changes in the cost of acquiring, financing and operating automobiles for business purposes.
